translation: Sanjaya said: Having spoken thus to Hrishikesha, the Lord of the senses, Arjuna, the conqueror of sleep and destroyer of foes, said, "I will not fight," and became silent.
commentary: 2.9 Evam thus? Uktva having spoken? Hrishikesha to Hrishikesha? Gudakesha: Arjuna (the coneror of sleep)? Parantapa destroyer of foes? I will not fight I will not fight? It is thus? Govindam to Govinda? Having said having said? Tushnim silent? became became became.No commentary.
